itunes:title: Moon Juice
title: Moon Juice
description:
What's that Gwyneth Paltrow's drinking? It's MOON JUICE! This week, we're talking adaptogens, brain dust, hot sex milk and the wellness company that's taken L.A. by storm. Be sure to take your quinton shots before you listen to this one.

Thanks to Ashley Smith for editing assistance and Doctor Dreamchip for our lovely theme song!

Support us:

  •  Subscribe on Patreon
  • Donate on PayPal
  •  Get Maintenance Phase shirts, stickers and more

Links!:

  • How Hollywood's Favorite Juice Bar Owner Eats Every Day (Elle)
  • How Amanda Chantal Bacon Perfected the Celebrity Wellness Business (NYT)
  • What Are Adaptogens? (NYT)
  • Wellness Brand Moon Juice Has Plenty of Haters - And Its Founder is Cool With That (Entrepreneur)
  • The Moon Juice Gospel of Self (The New Yorker)
  • How Wellness Got Whitewashed (Glamour)
Support the show
